dish_name: Family-Style stuffed shells 3 cheese and spinach
description: Tender pasta shells stuffed with a creamy blend of three cheeses and fresh spinach, ready to bake.
ingredients: [{"name": "Ricotta cheese", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Cooked Shells", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Water", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Tomatoes", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Spinach", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Onions", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Tomato Paste", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Romano Cheese", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Celery", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Red Peppers", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Red wine vinegar", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Garlic", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Parmesan Cheese", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Canola Oil", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Salt", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Black Pepper", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Garlic Powder", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Onion Powder", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Oregano", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Basil", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Sugar", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Paprika Powder", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Thyme", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Parsley", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Sage", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "Rosemary", "units": null, "amount": null}]
instructions: OVEN: Preheat oven to 400°F (205°C). Remove tray from box. Leave film on tray, do not vent. Place tray on baking sheet. Cook from frozen for approximately 35 to 40 minutes. Uncover, continue cooking for 10 to 15 minutes. Let stand for 5 to 10 minutes, then enjoy. Please note that cooking time may vary depending on oven type. For food safety and quality, cook to a minimum internal temperature of 160 °F (71 °C). MICROWAVE: Remove tray from box. Leave film on tray, do not vent. Cook on high for 15 minutes. Uncover, continue cooking for 8 to 10 minutes. Let stand for 5 to 10 minutes, then enjoy. Please note that cooking time may vary depending on oven type. For food safety and quality, cook to a minimum Internal temperature of 160 °F (71 °C).
